messages.moveAsChild: Task [{draggedTaskName}] will be unlinked from {oldParentName} and linked to {newParentName}. Continue?
messages.moveAsChildNoOldParent: Task [{draggedTaskName}] will be linked to {newParentName}. Continue?
messages.moveAsChildSameParent: Task [{draggedTaskName}] will be moved to the first position under {newParentName}. Continue?
